subject: Simsonn Plus X pedals activate very slowly
description_text:
Hi

I just received my Simsonn Plux X pedals, and downloaded simsonn manager 2.1.2. For what ever reason it takes about 15 minutes from launch to pedas activate. Seems very odd.

I attached log file to message, I hope you can pass this along to developers so they can fix issue and release an update.

Thank you for good pedals, software needs bit work still.

--
Jyri Turkia
jyriturkia@outlook.com

conversations.body_text: Hi Jyri Turkia,    Thank you for your feedback. I will forward the logs to our developers for review and will get back to you once we have an update.

Hi Jyri Turkia,  We checked the software logs and found that it takes about 15 seconds from launch to operation, not 15 minutes. If possible, could you record a video for us to check and share the link via Google Drive, making sure the access permissions are set?

Hello,

I disagree strongly on 15 seconds, but as you reguested, I did record a video for you.
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1HdwX8409G8ztwnlmHF41fHvU9Vz5W1hV/view?usp=drive_link
I recorded video from my display so it's ultrawide resolution. I suggest you to download file instead of open it in browser so you can actually see properly.
As you can see from video, it indeed takes A LONG TIME for pedals to start working.
I also attached the logfile for today.

I hope this helps you to find the issue.

--
Jyri Turkia
jyriturkia@outlook.com
________________________________
Hi Jyri Turkia,  Thank you for your help. I have submitted the software to check the issue, and I will notify you immediately once there is any update.
